name: IT'S DOC DUTY
description: The player will play a medical soldier on the battlefield, trying to treat the trapped wounded and move them to safety by avoiding and shooting enemies. In addition to failing because of being wounded by the enemy, the medics may also end the game because of guilt. Shooting enemies or not treating the wounded in time will add to the guilt. Players need to plan their course of action rationally and rescue the injured as quickly as possible.
